content: 12 r3-5 single_crochet around r6 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next single_crochet around 18 r7-8 single_crochet around r9 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet around 24 r10 single_crochet around finish leaving long tail for sewing back paw in brown make 2 r1 ch6 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and in next 3 chs 3sc in last chain turn and continue in bottom free loops of chs single_crochet in next 5 chs 12 r2-4 single_crochet around finish leaving long tail for sewing assembly align body with shoulder hump facing up and the flatter side facing down legs sew upper front and back legs to the flatter underside on the front legs place the increases on r10 of the lower legs at the outer side before sewing to upper legs sew the back lower legs to back upper legs add additional stuffing until legs are stiff enough to hold up the body weight sew paws to front of lower legs with tan yarn embroider 5 toes on each paw using straight stitches face sew muzzle to lower part of face sew nose to end of muzzle and embroider a small line coming off the bottom of the nose embroider or sew buttons for eyes just above the muzzle sew ears onto head about 7 row back from the muzzle around r44 sew tail to rear facing down
